items.title: Russian official threatens Zelenskyy as Moscow claims Kyiv attacked Putin residence
items.description: A top Russian official on Monday issued personal threats against Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy.

items.title: Scammers notched $333 million from bitcoin ATM scams in 2025, FBI says
items.description: The FBI says fraudsters in 2025 bilked Americans out of more than $333 million with ruses perpetrated using bitcoin ATM machines.

items.title: China's top diplomat blasts US arms sale to Taiwan as military drills unfold
items.description: China’s top diplomat has slammed a record U.S. military sale to Taiwan

items.title: WATCH:  Looking back at Jim Morrison's history-making summit down Mount Everest
items.description: Will Reeve looks back at Jim Morrison's history-making descent down Mount Everest's most challenging route as part of Robin Roberts’ primetime special...

items.title: WATCH:  Thief returns stolen mandolins to guitar store with apology note
items.description: In a sobering decision, one drunk thief apparently changed his tune and returned two mandolins that he had previously stolen, according to the owner o...
